name: Eros Eau de Toilette Gift Set

about: Fragrance Family:Warm & Spicy.Scent Type:Cool Spices.Key Notes:Mint Leaves, Orange Blossom, Vanilla Madagascar.Set Description:Eros Eau de Toilette is a fresh, citrus-woody scent for him. ingredients: Alcohol Denat. (SD Alcohol 39-C), Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Limonene, Coumarin, Linalool, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Citronellol, Citral, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate,Geraniol, Cinnamal, Eugenol.
